Title: Banana Cake
Directions: Bake in three layer pans at 350 degrees.

Title: Blueberry Coffee Cake
Directions:
Mix butter, 1 cup sugar, flour, 2 eggs, 2 tsp vanilla, baking powder, and milk to make cake batter. Blend easily.  Add 3 cups of blueberries.  Put 2 1/2 cups of batter in pan.
Mix cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 egg, lemon juice and 1 tsp vanilla to make filling.  Put filling on top of batter.  Top with remaining batter.
Make streusel topping from flour, butter, brown sugar, ad cinnamon.  Sprinkle on top of cake.
Bake at 375 degrees for 1 hour and 5 minutes.  Check after 50 minutes.

Title: Chocolate Cake
Directions: Mix all ingredients together.  Pour in 1 cup boiling water.  Mix well.  Bake about 35 minutes at 375 degrees.

Title: Crazy Cake
Directions: Mix first 5 ingredients well, about 4 minutes.  Bake at 350 degrees in a 9x13 pan for 35 minutes. Poke holes in warm cake and pour on mixture of powdered sugar and lemon juice.

Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Directions: Mix apples and sugar well.  Add oil, nuts, and eggs.  Add vanilla and dry ingredients.  Bake at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes.  Serve with whipped cream or top with cream cheese frosting.

Title: Fresh Pear Cake
Directions: Butter and flour a 9 inch round pan.  Peel and slice pears.  Blend eggs, sugar, milk, and salt.  Add flour, mix well.  Fold 1/2 of pears into batter.  Pour into pan, fan remaining pears on top.  Dot with butter.  Bake at 350 degrees about 55 minutes.  Sprinkle with powdered sugar.

Title: Graham Cracker Cake
Directions: Cream butter and sugar.  Add crushed crackers, sour milk, and soda.  Stir in nuts.  Bake in 10 inch square baking pan.  Bake in 350 degree oven for 30-35 minutes.  Serve with whipped cream or thin powdered sugar icing.

Title: Hot Water Chocolate Cake
Directions: Mix all ingredients together.  Pour in 1 cup boiling water. Mix well.  Bake about 35 minutes at 375 degrees.
